pr_title: AF-2611: Allow default pages in Dashbuilder Runtime

timeline.message: AF-2611: Allow default pages in Dashbuilder Runtime

timeline.bodyText:
Can we move this call to the RouterScreen.java?
It looks like loadDashboards has more responsibilities than it implies.
So it makes more sense to me to let RouterScreen call loadDashboards and then goToIndex.
timeline.author: caponetto
